hero.p: Im a Front-end developer and ui/ux designer.In the section below you will find some of my jobs,also know my skills and work tools.I hope i can help you to make your projects come true.

skill.title: Skills
skill.pa: I decided to follow the path of a front-end developer, leaning more towards the visual part, using the most used tools today.
skill.pb: On the back-end side, I only have basic knowledge of NodeJs and express. MongoDb and Firestore for database. And some libraries for webscraping.
skill.pc: As for the design side, I've been using Photoshop for a long time to edit photos or images. But apart from this, i also added Figma for the layout of the web pages.

space.description: When i was building my portfolio, i had many ideas, in this case i try to do something out of normal

gamersHeaven.description: It is a non-functional virtual gaming platform.It consists of user registration, customizable profiles, payment methods, privileges according to type of plan, and more.

Aviva.description: It is a personal project with a user registration system, levels, rewards, and much more.

nbaScraper.description: It is a simple application to see what are the latest nba games, results, matches and standings.
